description: A three way between a seasoned pro - Raging Stallion Exclusive JDKollin - and two newbies - Steve John and Randy Manroot - takesTough As Nails into high gear. JD is one of ourfavorite ripped, muscular, sports jocks and his performance here is astandout! The fucking is fantastic as Director Taurus Dean shows thatlike Chris Ward, he has a full understanding of what makes a greatporn flick!
title: Tough As Nails, Scene #03
